channel.title: Frühling demo frontpage on Frühling demo
channel.description: Recent content in Frühling demo frontpage on Frühling demo

item.title: Example blog entry
item.description:
You are on the demo page of the Frühling theme for the static site generator Hugo. Sources of the theme are available here: https://github.com/romka/fruhling. Sources of this demo-site are here: https://github.com/romka/fruhling-demo.

The theme supports all standard Markdown formatting features:

  • lists,
  • varied styling,
  • code blocks,
  • photo galleries as a separate data type,
  • and 2 types of galleries embedded within other content.

item.title: Example note
item.description: This is an example of a note content type, it’s supposed to be a short message without a “read more” link.

item.title: Volcano trip 2024 — example of a "gallery" content type

item.title: About
item.description: Greetings! It’s an example of an “About” page in the Frühling theme!
